description:
**PLEASE WATCH THE VIDEO TO SEE HOW TO USE THE APP**

Do you ever need to measure something but don't have a tape measure? Well there's an app for that! Our app allows you to simply and accurately measure objects 2 feet in length or smaller. 

Using the app is rather simple. Launch the app and lay your device on a flat surface. Line the device up with the object you are measuring. Take your finger and place it towards the top of the screen and hold it there. Now just slide your phone. If you watch the youtube video above you will see how easy it is. 

*To change the color of the ruler simply double tap on the screen. 

We've set the limit to 2 feet because we weren't sure  how many feet would be needed. If you would like me to raise the limit please let me know in the comments.
